1563.name: SPA 864
1563.Applications: Cement industry, pumps, mixer blades, sleeves, mixers, shear blades and parts etc...
1563.Suitable_For: High-alloyed tubular wire for metal spray on a C-Ni-B- carbide basis for extreme hard deposits on parts subject to strong mineral abrasion. applications: Cement industry, pumps, mixer blades, sleeves, mixers, shear blades and parts etc.
